pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modified Skew Discrete Laplace Regression for Integer-Valued and Paired Discrete Data // Implementation of the modified skew discrete Laplace (SDL) regression model. The package provides a set of functions for a complete analysis of integer-valued data, where the dependent variable is assumed to follow a modified SDL distribution. This regression model is useful for the analysis of integer-valued data and experimental studies in which paired discrete observations are collected.
